snippet: The Day: What binds Nora Ephron and Ernest Borgnine, two very different people, is one of the most elusive quests in this difficult city: the search for love.
abstract: The Day: What binds Nora Ephron and Ernest Borgnine, two very different people, is one of the most elusive quests in this difficult city: the search for love.

headline.main: On Screen, Two New Yorks Bound by a Common Quest
